data.eml:eml: The Mimallonidae (Lepidoptera, Mimallonoidea) of the Caribbean Basin, with the descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Laurent, Ryan A. St., Mccabe, Timothy L. (2016): The Mimallonidae (Lepidoptera, Mimallonoidea) of the Caribbean Basin, with the descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 4084 (4): 557-571, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.4.6
